n_fi.description: number of financial institutions the user wishes to generate.

BANK.description: financial institutions type is bank. Contains the percentage of total financial institutions to assign as banks. Additionally, it also provides the filename of the 'bank' config file.

column_names.description: column names of the various financial institutions fields to populate in the DB. The column names must be specified in the same order as they are listed in the DB.

fb_fi.description: column names associated with the fb_fi table.

fb_bank_customers.description: column names associated with the fb_bank_customers table.
